name: Dhruvii
wishText: I hope this brings a smile to your face 😊
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! 🎶🎂 Many many happy blah...blah
text2: Like everyone else, that was my initial plan🤔
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: HAPPY BIRTHDAYYYY Dhruvi❤️🫶🏻🎀🥰🌏! Wish u get all the love, laughter, or everything u wish for! I just wanted to say u mean a lot to me and no matter where life takes us, you'll always have a special place in my heart.I am so grateful for the memories we shared, and I truly wish you the best—today and always.Take care of yourself and have an amazing year ahead.Best of luck!!
replayText: Want to feel this again? Click here!🔄
